bio:
Velvet Ink Media brings together creative and talented professionals 
with years of experience in web design and programming. We offer 
world-class web design and brand marketing services in Tampa, FL and 
throughout the country. At Velvet Ink Media, our mission is to help your
 company establish a strong presence online and meet your goals by 
determining how to best present your products and services to your 
target market.

In an ever-changing market of interactive and new media, your company 
cannot afford to get lost in a crowd of over one million websites. We 
pride ourselves on attention to detail, communication and commitment to 
quality - traits that help us create beautiful, functional websites and 
eye-catching marketing materials for our clients. Most important, we 
offer cost-effective services that get you the best return on your 
investment. Our design approach is simple: clean, creative, capable.
I live and breath web design and consider myself a Jack-Of-All-Trades
We are very easy going and take on any project with pride. Our conditions are pretty basic. Good communication, good communication and good communication. That's really it.

"I've been using the services of Ed Sweet for the past three years or so on my books, magazine articles, Web sites, scripts...basically anything that requires words! Ed knows me, understands my style, and is innately able to make me sound better. As a matter of fact, he probably edited this! I'd highly recommend his services if you're interested in a "ghostwriter" or editor. Everyone I've sent to him thus far is happy I did, and now also uses him frequently."
-- Clark Bartram

commnet: My experience with Les has been very smooth and productive. I'm a developer in the PC World and got stuck doing some maintenance work on my wife's Mac. I needed some quick guidance on how certain things work in the Mac World. My questions were far below Les's skill level but he was fast, accu …Read More

Les did a great job! This project was only a small one, but I would use Les for other larger projects in the future. Les was able to jump on the project and get it done quickly and created exactly what I needed the first time.

Les developed some backend scripts that potentially will be saving us hundreds of dollars a month of third-party licensing fees. He was able to drive the project forward with little direction and was very communicative. Very happy with the work.
Great work - was able to grasp the project's goals very quickly, delivered earlier than expected, and was able to refine the product until we were totally satisfied.
Les, did a wonderful and we plan on using him again.

abstrac: Expert Web Developer - Over 15 years experience
bio:
Hello,
I am owner of Blue Sky iSolutions, located in Evergreen, Colorado. Please visit the Blue Sky iSolutions website to see some examples of my most recent work.
Your satisfaction is my number one priority. I stand behind my work with a 100% bug-free guarantee on all of my code. I am personally available by telephone, email and/or instant messenger a minimum of 60 hours per week.
Please consider me for your next project.
Best Regards,
Les Brown
Blue Sky iSolutions

For small projects, I require no payment until the project is completed to your satisfaction. For larger projects, I typically request a percentage of the total fee up front or in escrow before the project begins. I am usually flexible in regards to payment. I rather do a good job for less money than a bad job for more money.

bio:

I am a Cad Drafter with over 21 years experience using Autocad that specializes in Architectural drafting but have spent a lot of time in other fields including, telecommunications, plumbing/electrical/mechanical and some minor structural drafting. I have completed projects using paper to CAD conversions, architectural floor plans, elevations, sections, details, etc. I have completed numerous plat/plot plans for site review and I work mainly on 2D drawingsI offer cad drafting services for mechanical (HVAC/Plumbing), Electrical, telecommunications , Architectural (floor plans, house plans, elevations, details, sections, etc.), paper to cad conversion, 2d drafting, As-Built Drawings, Field measurements, plot/plat plansStarting using Vectorworks as well in January to do project edits on home plans, including - floor plans, elevations, roof plans, details, etc. I continually s

abstrac: Using The Best PRACTICE TOOLS TO Build A Better Business !
bio: NutsIT Solutions understand that a team approach is essential in delivering a product that meets and exceeds your expectations. Nuts IT endeavors to join our expertise and knowledge of Internet solution development with your personal and industry knowledge to provide a one-of-a-kind best of breed application. To facilitate this team-oriented goal, we have a process that guarantees the project will run smoothly and successfully.Phase 1 :: Concept & PlanningPhase 2 :: EngineeringPhase 3 :: Creative & Visual DesignPhase 4 :: PrototypingPhase 5 :: DevelopmentPhase 6 :: Testing & Quality AssurancePhase 7 :: Launch & RolloutPhase 8 :: Maintenance & ReviewsOur Team: Nuts IT Solutions comprises a group of experienced professionals, engineers who have created a niche for ourselves that combines quality and value for our clients. Our engineers are certified network engineers & MCSE to carry out large turnkey projects of supply & networking of computer peripherals. The

Payment Terms:We generally work on Advance Payment (Prefer to receive via guru's safe pay escrow or invoice) Our Payment terms are as follows.25% - Advance Payment and the remaining on every milestone delivery. Communication:We will be providing the update to our clients either on daily basis or twice or thrice in a week whichever way our clients prefer. Our communication modes are Email, Mantis (Bug Tracking and Communication tool) and over phone.We will allot a dedicated team of experienced designers, developers and tester under a well-experienced Project Manager. Our Project Manager will be at the contact point and manages the progress throughout the project development and provide you the progress. General Availability:All the client emails will be responded within a business working day and all our Business Development Executives and Customer Support Executives will be available round the clock in all messengers and over phone.
